span.strong: ** In compliance with the PA Governor's office, RA will remain closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year.**

p.span: For more information, please check your email or visit our RA COVID-19 Information & Resources Page

img.title: US News & World Report Best High Schools 2020
img.alt: US News & World Report Best High Schools 2020

p.span: The US News & World Report ranked the Renaissance Academy Charter School (RA) #59 out of 754 Pennsylvania public schools, which makes RA the #2 ranked PA charter school on the list. Nationally, the report ranked Renaissance Academy #1541 out of the 24,000+ public high schools reviewed.

Founded in 1999, Renaissance Academy is a tuition-free, accredited, K-12, college-prep, award-winning, public Charter School located in Phoenixville, PA. We currently educate students from 20 surrounding school districts. Our dedicated staff works collaboratively with students and their families to ensure that each and every student achieves their personal best as students with a strong emphasis on character development and core values.

img.alt: RA Senior Proudly Displaying her College Banner
img.title: RA Senior Proudly Displaying her College Banner

a.title: RA Seniors Offered Over $14 Million in Academic Scholarships

h3.a: RA Seniors Offered Over $14 Million in Academic Scholarships

div.div: These 74 seniors have been accepted to universities such as Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute, Dickinson College, Boston University, Bucknell University, University of Rochester, Ohio State University, Olin College of Engineering, University of Michigan, American University...
div.a: Read More about RA Seniors Offered Over $14 Million in Academic Scholarships

img.alt: Class of 2020 Yard Sign on Lawn
img.title: Class of 2020 Yard Sign on Lawn

a.title: Class of 2020 Given Boost from RA Board of Trustees

h3.a: Class of 2020 Given Boost from RA Board of Trustees

div.div: The RA Board of Trustees commissioned the creation of special yard signs designed to encourage and celebrate the Class of 2020, now forced to spend the remainder of their senior year at home due to COVID-19.
div.a: Read More about Class of 2020 Given Boost from RA Board of Trustees

img.alt: Ayla, Mrs. Kelly, Emilio (at art show) & Pearlyn's Artwork
img.title: Ayla, Mrs. Kelly, Emilio (at art show) & Pearlyn's Artwork

a.title: RA Artists Selected for 2020 PAEA Exhibit

h3.a: RA Artists Selected for 2020 PAEA Exhibit

div.div: The artwork of Ayla Collingwood, 11th grade, Emilio Berico, 10th grade, and Pearlyn Sathish, 6th grade was selected to be presented at the 2020 PAEA art show.
div.a: Read More about RA Artists Selected for 2020 PAEA Exhibit

div.p: The Renaissance Academy is committed to ensuring that all information placed on its website is accessible to individuals with disabilities. If you have a disability and the format of any material on our website interferes with your ability to access the information, please Visit our Accessibility Page for assistance.
